title: Antioch Police Department Communications Query (Antioch California Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. All email communications between Mayor Lamar Thorpe and Chief  of Police Steven A. Ford between November 1st 2022 to May 8th 2023

2. All email communications Councilmember Tamisha Torres-Walker and Chief  of Police  Steven A. Ford between November 1st 2022 to May 8th 2023

3. All email communications  Councilmember Michael Barbanica and  Chief of Police  Steven A. Ford between November 1st 2022 to May 8th 2023

4. All email communications  Councilmember Lori Ogorchock and  Chief  of Police Steven A. Ford between November 1st 2022 to May 8th 2023

5. All email communications  Councilmember Monica E. Wilson and  Chief of Police  Steven A. Ford between November 1st 2022 to May 8th 2023

6. All email communications  City Manager Cornelius H. Johnson and  Chief of Police Steven A. Ford between November 1st 2022 to May 8th 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Query: 1970 Taylor Road
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Email communications between Joseph Losado and Jason Crapo between January 1st, 2021 up to May 8th 2023 for 1970 Taylor Road.

2. Abatement plan for 1970 Taylor Road

3. Building inspection history reports from January 1st 2021 up to May 8th 2023 for 1970 Taylor Road.

4. All notices provided to tenants regarding abatement proceedings.

5. Email communications of Joseph Losado and/or Jason Crapo between January 1st, 2021 up to May 8th 2023 for 1970 Taylor Road, in which they request housing assistance, and other forms of aid, for tenants at 1970 Taylor Road.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson
